PISTOL.strategy: **2-1-2 Setup**: 2 players A (quad/site), 1 player mid, 2 players B (apps/site). Mid player calls rotations, A players hold crossfires.
**Aggressive Banana**: 3 players banana (car control), 1 player A, 1 player B apps. Banana players push for picks early.
**Stack A**: 3 players A site (quad, default, close), 2 players banana/B. Focus on A retakes, banana rotates fast.
**Apps Control**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players apps (balcony control). Apps players hold aggressively.
**Anti-Rush A**: 3 players A (close angles), 1 player mid, 1 player banana. A players crossfire long rushes.
**Rotational**: 1 player A, 2 players mid/banana, 2 players B. Mobile defense, fast rotates based on contact.
**Banana Stack**: 2 players A, 3 players banana/B. Heavy banana control, force A plays with utility.
**Mid Control**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (short control), 1 player banana. Mid players deny short access.
**B Heavy**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B (apps/site). Strong B defense, quick A support.
**Info Play**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. Conservative angles, information and retake focus.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A Close**: 4 players A site (close angles), 1 player B. Upgraded pistols, close-range trades.
**Aggressive Banana**: 3 players banana with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Banana players push car area.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A (save), 4 players B/apps close angles. Upgraded pistols B, overwhelm area.
**Apps Push**: 2 players A, 3 players apps (balcony push). Apps players armor+pistol, aggressive contact.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players A close, 2 players banana/B save. A players upgraded pistols, crossfires.
**Full Save**: All save completely. 2 A, 1 mid, 2 B. Conservative angles, exit frag focus.
**Mid Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (short push). Mid players upgraded pistols, deny access.
**Banana Control**: 2 players A, 2 players banana (car push), 1 player B save. Banana players upgraded pistols.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. All save, retake utility coordination.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A (1 upgraded), 2 players banana (1 upgraded), 1 player B save.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Banana**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players banana (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long angles.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Strong A hold.
**Banana Control**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 3 players banana (2 rifles defensive). Banana rifles hold car area.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players banana (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long, SMGs retake.
**Apps Rifle**: 2 players A (SMGs), 2 players apps (1 rifle), 1 player banana (rifle). Apps rifle balcony.
**Balanced**: 2 players A (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players banana (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B (rifle).
**B Heavy**: 2 players A (SMGs), 1 player banana (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B defense.
**Mid Rifle**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player banana (SMG). Mid rifle short control.
**Aggressive Banana**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players banana (2 rifles push). Banana rifles map control.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG).

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid, 2 players B (rifles). AWP banana or A long.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (rifles + utility), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Strong A defense.
**Banana Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players banana (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy banana presence.
**Apps Deny**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players apps (rifles + utility), 1 player banana (rifle). Smoke balcony.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players banana (rifles), 1 player B (rifle + utility). Split defense.
**AWP Quad**: 2 players A (1 AWP quad, 1 rifle), 2 players banana (rifles), 1 player B (rifle).
**Mid Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (rifles + utility). Heavy short control with utility.
**B Stack**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player banana (rifle), 2 players B (rifles). Fast A rotations if needed.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Retake focus.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players banana (rifles push), 1 player B (rifle). Banana map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **Apartments Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush apartments with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear balcony quickly.
**Banana Control**: 4 players banana with utility, 1 player apartments. Banana players use pop-flashes, fight for control.
**A Rush Long**: 3 players long A with armor, 2 players mid/short. Long players coordinate pop-flashes.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke), 2 players banana. Mid players smoke top mid, take control.
**A Split**: 2 players long A, 3 players mid to short. Long players smoke quad, coordinate timing.
**B Default**: 2 players apps, 2 players banana, 1 player mid. Play for picks and information.
**Short Rush**: 4 players mid to short with pop-flashes, 1 player banana. Short players coordinate utility.
**Banana Fake to A**: 2 players make noise banana with utility, 3 players position mid/short. Execute A short after CT rotations to banana.
**Apps Control**: 3 players apartments with utility, 2 players banana. Apps players smoke balcony.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players long A, 2 players apps, 1 player mid. Create pressure from multiple angles.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven Apps Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush apartments together with pop-flashes.
**Stack Banana**: All 5 players stack banana area. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles.
**Mid Lurk**: 1 player lurks mid with upgraded pistol, 2 players apps, 2 players banana. Multi-angle pressure.
**Deagle Long**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor long A, 3 players support with utility.
**Apps Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols apps, 1 player saves. Apps players smoke balcony.
**Anti-Force Banana**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven banana, 2 players save. Force players smoke car.
**Short Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid/short, 3 players save.
**Banana Control**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols banana, 2 players save.
**Split Save**: 2 players force long A, 2 players force banana, 1 player saves mid.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 long A, 2 apps, 1 mid. Exit frags only.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles long A, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support.
**Banana Presence**: 2 rifles banana, 2 SMGs apps, 1 rifle mid. Banana rifles smoke car.
**Apps Take**: 2 rifles apps, 2 SMGs banana, 1 rifle mid. Apps rifles smoke balcony.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs banana. Mid players smoke top mid.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle long A, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle banana, 2 SMGs floating.
**Long Focus**: 4 players long A (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. Long players smoke quad.
**Short Split**: 2 rifles mid to short, 2 SMGs banana, 1 rifle long A. Execute A split through short and long.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Balcony Control**: 2 rifles apps, 2 SMGs banana, 1 rifle mid. Apps rifles smoke balcony.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles key angles, SMGs support.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke quad + default, flash over smokes. 3 players long A, 2 players short.
**Banana Take**: 3 players banana with full utility, 2 players apps. Banana players smoke car + CT.
**B Split**: 2 players apps, 3 players banana to B. Smoke balcony + site, flash over smokes.
**Mid Control**: 4 players mid, 1 player banana. Mid players smoke top mid + short, take control.
**Default Setup**: 2 long A, 2 banana, 1 mid. AWPer banana or long, riflers support.
**A Fake to B**: 2 players make noise long A with utility, 3 players banana. Execute B after CT rotations from A.
**Apps Execute**: 4 players apps with full utility, 1 player banana lurk. Apps players smoke balcony.
**Quad Control**: 3 players long A, 2 players mid. Long players smoke quad + default, take control.
**Anti-Stack B**: Heavy utility on banana, 4 players execute B site. 1 player long A watches rotations.
**Late Round A**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute A through short with full utility.
